channel.title: War on Camelot [Like a PI version of Cammy PvP][RELEASED]
channel.description:
[ul][list][list][center][IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/WaronCamelotbanner.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Hello, and welcome to my newest project: War on Camelot. The base is CruelalityX, PI/DSPK
[b]Current Staff:[/b] Owner: TheHolyGrail Co-Owner: ii bandos ii
There are a few reasons I am making this: 1) To meet new people and start getting myself known on Mopar. 2) For fun. 3) Learning purposes. I hope to learn a lot while working on this project.
I hope to have daily updates on this project, but that may not be possible, because I often stay at relatives houses, and they don't always have internet. I will still try to have updates as frequently as possible on this project, and please remember that I am working on this alone.
If you can try to keep this thread active and bumped with feedback and suggestions, that would be greatly appreciated. :rolleyes:[/center]
[center][size=14pt][b]THIS IS NOW BEING HOSTED! PM ME FOR DL LINK[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Goals/Updates[/size][/center] [list] [li]PvP outside of Camelot, bank safe zone[/li] [li]Customized Camelot bank[/li] [li]HighScore Board[/li] [li]Party Room is multi zone[/li] [li]Pure only pking zone, that you need 45 defence or less, and you can't train defence inside of it[/li] [li]You can get a prize from bosses that will give you a random rare[/li] [li]Ranking system[/li] [li]KillStreak System[/li] [li]Good skilling area (I want skillers to feel welcome to the server as well)[/li] [/list] [center](Off the top of my head)[/center]
[center][size=18pt]Media[/size][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammypartyroom.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammyhome.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammypurepkzone.jpg[/img][/center] Unfinished - Still need to make it so you can't train defence here
[center][size=16pt]Credits[/size][/center] [center]- Sanity - $The True Killer$ of R-S - The Staff of the Server[/center][/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: War on Camelot [Like a PI version of Cammy PvP][RELEASED]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:19, topic:387590”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=483390.msg3550380#msg3550380 date=1301455763]
@ asshole_rule

It may not be the most stable base, but I’m still learning as I go. And I’m trying to code some of the features from Cammy PvP into my server, so that’s why you see things you may not consider “unique”.

Thanks for the post.
[/quote]

this isnt youtube, you can simply quote his post lol[/quote]I know lol… but @ Squirt Ltd seems cooler.

item.title: War on Camelot [Like a PI version of Cammy PvP][RELEASED]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

@ asshole_rule

It may not be the most stable base, but I’m still learning as I go. And I’m trying to code some of the features from Cammy PvP into my server, so that’s why you see things you may not consider “unique”.

Thanks for the post.

item.title: War on Camelot [Like a PI version of Cammy PvP][RELEASED]
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

How are those good ideas? Every PvP server I've ever logged into had pretty much all of those features. This development will most likely fail because DSPK is complete SHIT. I'm not flaming either, everything I've said is true. You need to be unique, get some ideas that nobody else has.

Stfu and reply to the topic, no someone elses reply.

Read full topic
item.source: War on Camelot [Like a PI version of Cammy PvP][RELEASED]

item.title: War on Camelot [Like a PI version of Cammy PvP][RELEASED]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Halflingblade, post:12, topic:387590”][quote]PvP outside of Camelot, bank safe zone
Customized Camelot bank
HighScore Board
Party Room is multi zone
Bosses drop christmas crackers
Christmas crackers give random rare when used on another player[/quote]

These are all good ideas for a PVP server, you said they were off the top of your head. Thats pretty good, keep it up man. Only problem is I wouldn’t make the crackers drop every time.[/quote]

How are those good ideas? Every PvP server I’ve ever logged into had pretty much all of those features.
This development will most likely fail because DSPK is complete SHIT. I’m not flaming either, everything I’ve said is true. You need to be unique, get some ideas that nobody else has.

Read full topic

item.title: War on Camelot [Like a PI version of Cammy PvP][RELEASED]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[ul][list][list][center][/center]

[center]Hello, and welcome to my newest project: War on Camelot.
The base is CruelalityX, PI/DSPK

Current Staff:
Owner: TheHolyGrail
Co-Owner: ii bandos ii

There are a few reasons I am making this:

  1. To meet new people and start getting myself known on Mopar.
  2. For fun.
  3. Learning purposes. I hope to learn a lot while working on this project.

I hope to have daily updates on this project, but that may not be possible, because I often stay at relatives houses, and they don’t always have internet. I will still try to have updates as frequently as possible on this project, and please remember that I am working on this alone.

If you can try to keep this thread active and bumped with feedback and suggestions, that would be greatly appreciated. :rolleyes:[/center]

[center][size=14pt]THIS IS NOW BEING HOSTED! PM ME FOR DL LINK[/size][/center]

[center][size=18pt]Goals/Updates[/size][/center]
[list]
[li]PvP outside of Camelot, bank safe zone[/li]
[li]Customized Camelot bank[/li]
[li]HighScore Board[/li]
[li]Party Room is multi zone[/li]
[li]Pure only pking zone, that you need 45 defence or less, and you can’t train defence inside of it[/li]
[li]You can get a prize from bosses that will give you a random rare[/li]
[li]Ranking system[/li]
[li]KillStreak System[/li]
[li]Good skilling area (I want skillers to feel welcome to the server as well)[/li]
[/list]
[center](Off the top of my head)[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Media[/size][/center]

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

[center]

waroncammypurepkzone.jpg946×239
[/center]
Unfinished - Still need to make it so you can’t train defence here

[center][size=16pt]Credits[/size][/center]
[center]- Sanity

  • $The True Killer$ of R-S
  • The Staff of the Server[/center][/list][/list][/ul]
